thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Thunisoft sees FY 2017 net profit up 40 pct to 50 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Thunisoft sees FY 2017 net profit up 40 pct to 50 pct
text:
Jan 22(Reuters) - Beijing Thunisoft Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 40 percent to 50 percent, or to be 380.4 million yuan to 407.5 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 271.7 million yuan
* The reasons for the forecast are strengthened competitiveness in the core business area and steadily grow of the overall operating performance Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/88U7MM Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
